sentence.Network_en: Flattening of the right atrial border is also seen in constrictive pericarditis.
sentence.Network_cn: 右心房缘变平亦见于缩窄性心包炎.

sentence.Network_en: Early pericarditis may also produce a friction thrill.
sentence.Network_cn: 早期心包炎也会产生一种摩擦性震颤.

sentence.Network_en: Pericarditis may occur as a primary disease process.
sentence.Network_cn: 心包炎可能是一种原发性疾患.
